procedures.name: Physical Examination
procedures.label: History and Physical Examination
procedures.description: A standard physical examination performed at screening including recording of age, gender, presence of diabetes, diabetic treatment, prior foot ulcers, prior amputations or foot surgeries, co-existing medical conditions

code.decode: Office or outpatient visit for evaluation and management

procedures.name: Medical History Collection
procedures.label: Medical History
procedures.description: Recording of socio-demographics, medical history including comorbidities, history of falls, hospitalization, prior surgery, duration of MCI diagnosis, medication use, hearing and visual performance, frailty status

procedures.name: Vibration Perception Threshold Testing
procedures.label: VPT Testing
procedures.description: Peripheral neuropathy assessment evaluated at the distal great toe, heel and 5th metatarsal to examine foot sensation

code.decode: Unlisted neurological or neuromuscular diagnostic procedure

procedures.name: Frailty Assessment
procedures.label: Fried Frailty Criteria Assessment
procedures.description: Assessment of frailty status using Fried Frailty criteria including weight loss, grip strength, physical activity levels, 15 foot walk time, and exhaustion

procedures.name: Cognitive Assessment
procedures.label: MoCA Assessment
procedures.description: Montreal Cognitive Assessment for cognitive status evaluation with scores between 20-26 indicating mild dementia

procedures.name: Psychiatric Screening
procedures.label: eMINI Administration
procedures.description: Administration of valid and reliable eMINI to exclude individuals with substance use, bipolar, and psychotic disorders

procedures.name: Anthropometric Measurements
procedures.label: Height and Weight Measurement
procedures.description: Measurement of height and weight to determine body mass index

procedures.name: Questionnaire Administration
procedures.label: Health Questionnaires
procedures.description: Administration of health related questionnaires including Promise Global (quality of life), Beck Anxiety Scale, Pain-Mobility, FES-I (fear of falling), Fried Frailty, MOCA, CES-D (depression), Trail-making task A and B, LifeSpace, ePro Lawton and Katz Scale

procedures.name: Gait Assessment
procedures.label: Gait Performance Assessment
procedures.description: Assessment of gait performance using body worn sensors measuring velocity, stride length, stride time, double support, single support, stride-to-stride variability, gait initiation, and center of mass range of motion over 20 meters at habitual and maximum speed

procedures.name: Balance Assessment
procedures.label: Balance Quantification
procedures.description: Balance assessment using body worn sensors measuring ankle and hip motion in 3D, 2D COM sway, and RCI in ML and AP directions according to Romberg protocol during eyes-open and eyes-closed conditions

procedures.name: Physical Activity Monitoring
procedures.label: 48-Hour Activity Monitoring
procedures.description: Monitoring of physical activity parameters including steps taken, duration of sitting, standing, walking and lying, sit to stand transitions, and walking speed for 48 hours using wearable device

procedures.name: Exercise Intervention
procedures.label: Exergaming Exercise Program
procedures.description: Six week exercise program using Exergaming platform twice per week for approximately 30 minutes including ankle reaching tasks, motor-cognitive exercises, and Trail-Making inspired tasks

procedures.name: Trail-Making Test
procedures.label: Motor-Cognitive TMT Exercise
procedures.description: Motor-cognitive exercise including working memory tasks inspired from paper-pencil Trail-Making test with three levels of complexity: Fixed-order TMT, Random-order TMT, and Number-Letter-order TMT

procedures.name: Informed Consent Process
procedures.label: Consent Procedure
procedures.description: Obtaining informed consent from subjects prior to any study related procedures, including Spanish language consent for Spanish speaking subjects

procedures.name: Kaplan Co-morbidity Index Assessment
procedures.label: Disease Severity Scoring
procedures.description: Use of Kaplan Co-morbidity Index to score disease severity

medicalDevices.name: LegSys
medicalDevices.label: legsys
medicalDevices.description: Validated body worn sensor system for gait assessment using five sensor modules attached to right and left anterior shins, right and left anterior thighs, and posteriorly to the lower back

medicalDevices.name: BalanSens
medicalDevices.label: balansens
medicalDevices.description: Validated body worn sensor system for balance quantification measuring ankle and hip motion in three dimensions, 2D COM sway, and RCI in ML and AP directions

medicalDevices.name: PAMSys
medicalDevices.label: Physical Activity Monitor
medicalDevices.description: Wearable device attached to pendant worn around the neck for measuring physical activity parameters including steps, duration of activities, transitions, and walking speed for 48 hours

medicalDevices.name: Exergaming Platform
medicalDevices.label: Exercise Gaming System
medicalDevices.description: Interactive exercise platform for performing ankle-foot trail making exercises and motor-cognitive tasks remotely

medicalDevices.name: Vibration Perception Threshold Device
medicalDevices.label: VPT Testing Device
medicalDevices.description: Device for evaluating vibration perception threshold at distal great toe, heel and 5th metatarsal for peripheral neuropathy assessment
